name: Tomb of the Scarab God
description:
Tomb of the Scarab God is a fast paced tower defense created for the Indie Tales 2021 Game Jam! 

You are taking refuge in the final chamber of the Scarab God's pyramid! You must protect the crystal at all costs! Do you have what it takes to survive the wrath of the scarab god?

To run the tutorial, press the ? in the title screen.

Each tower can be upgraded once, and behave as follows:

Spikes emerge when pressed
Upgraded spikes emerge when an enemy walks over them

Flame Trap fires in the direction of the arrow when pressed
Upgraded Flame fires in all directions

Sarcophagus Trap fires a projectile in a random direction
Upgraded Sarcophagus fires at the closest enemy

The last trap is a splitter, to split the signal from a button to two traps.

The last shop item is more buttons!
